tutorial.title: Game rules:
tutorial.text:
A set of 30 circles are placed on random positions in range of 1 to 30.
A single pointer (reversed triangle) is positioned on circle 1. That pointer displays the player's current position. The goal â€“ every single turn the pointer must be moved to next circle with appropriate number. Whenever you reach the last 30th circle, victory is yours.
Not all of circle numbers are visible. Only the current goal and last three visited circles are visible.
Pointer leaves a trail behind. This will disappear in 5 turns.
Following mistakes should be prevented:

					The pointer must not cross or hit its own trail

					The pointer should not hit any other circle then the current goal.

					The boundaries of the world (game screen) must not be hit.

					The pointer stamina to run out before you reach the current goal.

If such mistake occurs one Health Point is taken and the pointer will be returned to start position of current turn.The game will end either with all 30 circles cleared or with Health Point reduced to 0.


HAVE FUN
